name: V_EHI_ORD_ITM_AUDIT_TRL
description: This view contains an audit history of several Orders items, along with human-readable versions of the old and new values and references to Clarity columns that extract those items.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: Contains the old value for the item that was changed.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: Contains the new value for the item that was changed.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: Contains the old value for the item that was changed, in external format. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: Contains the new value for the item that was changed, in external format. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: ITEM_CHNG_USER_ID
columns.description: Contains the ID of the user who changed the item.

columns.name: ITEM_CHNG_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ITEM_CHANGE_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the instant the item was changed.

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The table and column descriptor associated with the item in the ITEM column.

columns.name: ITEM
columns.description: The item number for the item that was changed.
